subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Kansas closed a 6-point deficit with less than two minutes left, but lost for the second time in three games when Colorado’s Askia Booker made a 25-footer at the buzzer.
snippet: Kansas closed a 6-point deficit with less than two minutes left, but lost for the second time in three games when Colorado’s Askia Booker made a 25-footer at the buzzer.
